meta_description: Sajan Pande is a FullStack web developer focusing on development with modern frontend technologies and practices. Skillset includes TypeScript frameworks such as Vue.js and React.js, SCSS, HTML and API integration with third-parties.
meta_keywords: web, frontend, developer, UX, vue.js, react.js, nuxt.js, node.js, css, html, javascript, wordpress, webpack, design

meta_image.alt: Sajan Pande - Frontend web developer and interface designer

title: I am Sajan Pande, I Bridge Function and Form in Software

description.text: I am a FullStack Web and Software Developer  who enjoys learning new technologies. I love competing in Hackathons and working on interesting project ideas where I can learn and hone my skils.

colophon.text:
Find me at GitHub and LinkedIn.
Download my resume (PDF)

content.text: Hello! I'm Sajan Pande, a software developer passionate about fullstack web development, innovative software solutions. As an  B.Tech student at Gujarat Techonolgy University, I've honed a versatile skill set that empowers me to tackle complex challenges from multiple perspectives.

My journey in tech has been marked by a series of exciting internships, projects and hackathons. I've consistently pushed the boundaries of what's possible in web and software development. These experiences showcase my ability to leverage emerging technologies and my deep understanding of both high-level and low-level software architecture.
When not immersed in code, I'm either organizing tech events, exploring the realms of literature and cosmic wonders, or expressing my creativity through sketches.
Here are some of the technologies I've experience with:

-   JavaScript/TypeScript
-   NodeJS/ExpressJS
-   ReactJS/NextJS
-  Angular
-   Azure
-   MongoDB
-   Spring/SpringBoot
- Java

paragraph.text: We've worked with Sajan on several projects and the work is of consistently high-quality. He continues to be one of our most valued digital resources and we look forward to working together more in future.

Sajan was incredibly thorough and professional in bringing our new website to life. As designers, we can be quite picky about how things work, but he took the challenge and developed every single aspect beautifully.
Working with Sajan has always been a smooth process from initial concepts to problem-solving, right through to every aspect of the development stages. He's our perfect digital partner.

content.text: Swipe or drag below to see a small selection of projects I've worked on.

items.name: GitHub Circle
items.role: Discover a smarter way to explore. It not only provides detailed insights but also creates interactive UI components on-the-fly.

items.name: Melomint
items.role: A Unique music platform empowering artists with AI-driven nested royalties and NFT members and Transparent analytics. Seamless access to a vast high-quality song library for users. Support artists with exclusive NFTs with Flow blockchain.

items.name: MakeIt
items.role: A web app for visualizing personalized Spotify data. View your top artists, top tracks, recently played tracks, and detailed audio information about each track. Create and save new playlists of recommended tracks based on your existing playlists and more.

items.name: Zest
items.role: The website has events for a month, with visitor and admin modes. Visitors register and verify email to access events, while admins manage users and events through direct database access.
